summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 11th Avenue West and 12th Avenue West, each from West Dravus Street to West Nickerson Street; 13th Avenue West and 14th Avenue West, each from West Bertona Street to West Nickerson Street; West Dravus Street, from 11th Avenue West to 13th Avenue West; West Bertona Street, and Ruffner Street, each from 11th Avenue West to 15th Avenue West; and Emerson Street, from 11th Avenue West to 14th Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6382, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
